item.description:
Create soothing, healing salves and lotions to pamper your skin! Learn the basics to make herbal infused oils, salves, lotions, and your own skin-soaking preparations without any synthetic ingredients. Especially helpful for those with sensitive skin. Bring home a lip balm, healing salve, and lotion, scented with individual choices of essential oils.

Cost: $49.00 A $12 materials fee is payable to the instructor at the first class.
To register, go here: https://www.northshore.edu/admissions/register_now.html and use this course info: CSM188â€“ACH16290
item.name: Luscious Lotions, Simple Salves with Iris Weaver
